message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire something worth a lot to you.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, I can't go as low as $950,000.  Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for the product.
